root.name: IntensityInRectangle
root.description: An useful and cool painter plugin which displays the intensity profile of a roi within a resizable rectangle ROI.
root.author: oeway - Wei Ouyang
root.changelog:
- Version 2.5.0.0 Date 2013-12-13 14:55:47
* Compute intensity profile in a separate thread to avoid GUI blocking * other improvement for better manipulation
- Version 2.3.0.1 Date 2013-12-13 09:31:27
* improve display format
- Version 2.3.0.0 Date 2013-12-13 08:35:30
Repackage version
* improve stability and speed * support area ROI * Press 's' key to prevent ROI pair auto selection
- Version 2.2.0.1 Date 2013-12-13 08:25:46
* improve stability and speed * support area ROI * Press 's' key to prevent ROI pair auto selection
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2013-12-12 12:41:45
* Bug fixed, more stable * Show more information
- Version 2.0.0.1 Date 2013-12-11 19:09:49
* support point roi and other rois * add cursor to indicate current position * code clean up
- Version 1.2.0.2 Date 2013-11-03 13:37:03
Fix error with the jar file
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2013-11-03 11:18:13
Regression from version 1.1.0.1
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2013-11-03 11:03:03
Corrected the jar file error.
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2013-11-03 11:02:08
Regression from version 1.0.0.0
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2013-11-03 10:43:04
Keep update with Icy 1.4
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2013-10-22 18:33:39
Automatic naming for each ROI and showing it in the canvas
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2013-10-20 16:37:32
